    Hello World!

    Aug 01, 2014
    blog
    University of Minnesota Codework Collaborative

    This is a sample blog post. We can add blog posts periodically if we want to add commentary that doesn’t fit in any of the other post types. These blog posts will be aggregated in the “What’s New?” section on the home page, and will show up alongside all of the other posts (events, projects).

    By default, it will display “University of Minnesota Codework Collaborative” as the post’s author. To override that and add you own name, add an “author” tag with your name to the frontmatter.
